Ksharans...why does it always have to be ksharans? And how do you even pronounce it?

Doesn't matter. What matters is this: their mercenary berserkers have a core of darkness where we all have a heart. Bring me them.

My ex-wife was heartless. Wonder if she was really a ksharan?
Great, <PCNAME>. I think I have a clever use for these.
I don't like fighting ksharans either. Their strange consonant clusters disturb me.
